languages.text: "Вломил меня, крыса интендантская?" {n}И голос, и манеры Джай явственно меняются. В обычно мягкой речи прорезается колкий солдатский говорок.{/n} "Видишь, какие у тебя внимательные и пронырливые слуги, {name}. К гроксу в жопу влезут, но все выведают".

"Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."
languages.original_text: "Вломил меня, крыса интендантская?" {n}И голос, и манеры Джай явственно меняются. В обычно мягкой речи прорезается колкий солдатский говорок.{/n} "Видишь, какие у тебя внимательные и пронырливые слуги, {name}. К гроксу в жопу влезут, но все выведают".

traits.locale_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “就是你在告发我，对不对，你这个想当军事后勤官的王八蛋？”{n}婕伊的声音与举止都发生了鲜明的变化。她一贯温和的言辞，被士兵刺耳的粗话取代。{/n}“你的仆人可真是什么都不会看漏啊，{name}，一个个都狡猾得很。只要他们想挖出点什么东西，就算爬到格洛克斯兽的屁股上也不在乎。”
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: “就是你在告发我，对不对，你这个想当军事后勤官的王八蛋？”{n}婕伊的声音与举止都发生了鲜明的变化。她一贯温和的言辞，被士兵刺耳的粗话取代。{/n}“你的仆人可真是什么都不会看漏啊，{name}，一个个都狡猾得很。只要他们想挖出点什么东西，就算爬到格洛克斯兽的屁股上也不在乎。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「クエスター志望の小僧が、あたしを密告したっていうの？」{n}ジェイの声と態度が一変する。いつものような穏やかな言葉ではなく、兵士のようなスラングがその喉を飛び出す。{/n}「{name}様、何からも目を離しちゃいけないよ、使用人もね。そいつらは卑劣な連中でもあるのさ。蜥蜴牛のケツに登ってても、知りたいことを知ろうとするだろうからね」
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: 「クエスター志望の小僧が、あたしを密告したっていうの？」{n}ジェイの声と態度が一変する。いつものような穏やかな言葉ではなく、兵士のようなスラングがその喉を飛び出す。{/n}「{name}様、何からも目を離しちゃいけないよ、使用人もね。そいつらは卑劣な連中でもあるのさ。蜥蜴牛のケツに登ってても、知りたいことを知ろうとするだろうからね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Has estado fisgando, ¿eh, cuestorcillo?». {n}La voz y el porte de Jae cambian completamente y su lenguaje habitualmente amable da paso a jerga.{/n} «A sus sirvientes no se les cuela una, {name}. Y son bastante cotillas también. Son capaces de adentrarse en el culo de un grox para descubrir lo que quieren saber».
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: «Has estado fisgando, ¿eh, cuestorcillo?». {n}La voz y el porte de Jae cambian completamente y su lenguaje habitualmente amable da paso a jerga.{/n} «A sus sirvientes no se les cuela una, {name}. Y son bastante cotillas también. Son capaces de adentrarse en el culo de un grox para descubrir lo que quieren saber».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Alors comme ça, vous m'avez balancée, misérable petit questeur au rabais ? » {n}La voix et l'attitude de Jae se transforment de façon radicale. Ses paroles habituellement douces deviennent cinglantes, son ton presque militaire.{/n} « Vos serviteurs ont l'œil, {name}, en plus d'être sournois. Ils fouilleraient à deux mains dans de la merde de grox si ça leur permettait de découvrir ce qu'ils veulent savoir. »
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: « Alors comme ça, vous m'avez balancée, misérable petit questeur au rabais ? » {n}La voix et l'attitude de Jae se transforment de façon radicale. Ses paroles habituellement douces deviennent cinglantes, son ton presque militaire.{/n} « Vos serviteurs ont l'œil, {name}, en plus d'être sournois. Ils fouilleraient à deux mains dans de la merde de grox si ça leur permettait de découvrir ce qu'ils veulent savoir. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mich also verpfiffen, kleiner Möchtegern-Questor?" {n}Jaes Stimme und Beherrschung haben sich gravierend geändert. Ihre sonst so typisch sanfte Ansprache ist jetzt gefärbt von bissigem Soldatenslang.{/n} "Euren Dienern entgeht wirklich nichts, {name}. Und raffiniert sind sie dazu auch noch. Sie würden selbst einem Grox in den Hintern kriechen, nur um herauszufinden, was sie wissen wollen."
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mich also verpfiffen, kleiner Möchtegern-Questor?" {n}Jaes Stimme und Beherrschung haben sich gravierend geändert. Ihre sonst so typisch sanfte Ansprache ist jetzt gefärbt von bissigem Soldatenslang.{/n} "Euren Dienern entgeht wirklich nichts, {name}. Und raffiniert sind sie dazu auch noch. Sie würden selbst einem Grox in den Hintern kriechen, nur um herauszufinden, was sie wissen wollen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Geçmişimi mi didikledin seni Quaestor özentisi?" {n}Jae'ın sesi ve duruşu, net bir dönüşüm geçiriyor. Tipik nazik konuşmalarının yerini askerlerin kullandığı bir hitap şekli alıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarından da bir şey kaçmıyormuş {name}. Az sinsi değillermiş. Öğrenmek istediklerini öğrenmek için groks götüne bile tırmanır böyleleri."
languages.original_text: "Shopped me, did you, you little wannabe Questor?" {n}Jae's voice and bearing undergo a stark transformation. Biting soldier slang cuts through her typically gentle speech.{/n} "Don't miss a thing, your servants, {name}. And they're sneaky as, too. They'll climb up a grox's arse to find out what they want to know."

traits.locale_text: "Demek geçmişimi didikledin ha, seni Quaestor özentisi?" {n}Jae'ın sesi ve duruşu net bir dönüşüm geçiriyor. Tipik nazik konuşmalarının yerini askerlerin kullandığı bir konuşma şekli alıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarından da bir şey kaçmıyormuş {name}. Az sinsi değillermiş. Öğrenmek istediklerini öğrenmek için groks götüne bile tırmanır böyleleri."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
